1 a.definition: going beyond what is usual, regular, or customaryof, relating to, or having the nature of a proceeding or action not normally required by law or not prescribed for the regular administration of law [an session of the legislature] [granted relief] compare

sub_terms.b: of or relating to a financial transaction that is not expected to be repeated [an charge against earnings] [an gain]

2.definition: employed for or sent on a special function or service [an ambassador ]
